news.title: Tusla chief apologises for statement that said girl (10) allegedly assaulted in west Dublin had ‘absconded’
news.summary: The chief executive of Tusla has apologised for the wording of a statement issued after the alleged sexual assault of a 10-year-old girl.

news.title: Jailed Enoch Burke must attend court via video link to hear judge's second judgment on contempt
news.summary: The High Court has granted an order allowing jailed schoolteacher Enoch Burke to attend court via videolink when a judgment will be delivered relating to his repeated breach of court orders.

news.title: Inside the house of crime boss ‘Fat’ Andy Connors sold today by Cab for six figures
news.summary: Twenty years after the Criminal Assets Bureau first set their eyes on the trophy home of ‘Fat’ Andy Connors, The Villa sold at auction today for €420,000.

news.title: Conor McGregor’s Forged Stout companies report losses of €7.7m
news.summary: Two companies behind Conor McGregor’s Forged Stout brand recorded combined losses of €7.7m last year, new accounts show.

news.title: Angie Benhaffaf, mother to twins Hassan and Hussein, who were born conjoined, named Carer of the Year
news.summary: Angie Benhaffaf raised her two sons after they were born conjoined and went on to become award-winning para-athletes but today was her moment as she was named Lidl’s Family Carer of the Year.

news.title: Bohemians considering Aviva Stadium return for first league game of 2026 – with St Patrick’s Athletic possible opponents
news.summary: Bohemians are considering kicking off the 2026 League of Ireland season with another Aviva Stadium Dublin derby with St Patrick’s Athletic emerging as the most likely opposition if the Gypsies opt to press ahead with the plan.

news.title: ‘It’s a huge shock and a huge loss’ – Body of beheaded stag found by staff in Dublin parklands after attack
news.summary: Workers at a North Dublin parklands have said they are “shocked” after finding the beheaded and dismembered body of a stag on Wednesday morning.

news.title: Small ferry sank off Kerry coast 28 minutes after it dropped 12 passengers at Skellig Michael, investigation finds
news.summary: A small ferry sank off the Kerry coast last year shortly after it had dropped 12 passengers and a crew member off at Skellig Michael, an investigation has revealed.

news.title: Tanya Sweeney: Why do people hate Joanne McNally’s South County Dublin accent so much? It’s complicated
news.summary: Joanne McNally is enjoying a big week after breaking another glass ceiling: she was recently announced as the first Irish female comedian to headline her own show at the 3Arena in December 2026.

news.title: Pól Ó Conghaile: Three things I learned about travel from four Irish twentysomethings
news.summary: How would you describe 2025 in a word?
